items.sentence: Don\'t worry. I\'ve done this a thousand times.
I\'m an eighth-grade science teacher in Boston.
I\'m asking you to do this because I trust you.
Why don\'t you just find another place to live?
Why don\'t you just go away and leave me alone?
It won\'t be long before we can travel to Mars.
Tom could only understand a little French then.
Tom hasn\'t taken a bath since three weeks ago.
It wasn\'t Tom\'s first time to hear Mary sing.
It wasn\'t just me who didn\'t like that movie.
